contextual_questions.question: Faced with two equally unappealing options, she found herself in a difficult _____.
A _____ glance at the report revealed several obvious errors.
She tried to _____ her reluctant brother into joining the family vacation.
The teacher had to _____ the students for their disruptive behavior during the assembly.
After the heated argument, he adopted a _____ tone to restore peace.
The _____ dispute had resisted all attempts at resolution for over a decade.
The detective faced a perplexing _____ with no obvious solution in sight.
The _____ weather made it impossible to plan outdoor activities with confidence.
Rather than offer constructive criticism, he chose to _____ his opponent's achievements.
The _____ beauty of cherry blossoms makes their brief blooming season even more precious.
The _____ protests outside the courthouse could be heard from several blocks away.
After weeks of resistance, the city was forced to _____ to the enemy's demands.
Health-conscious consumers increasingly _____ processed foods in favor of natural alternatives.
The _____ of car horns and construction noise made conversation impossible.
The _____ child was reading university-level texts at age ten.
His refreshing _____ during the interview impressed the hiring committee.
The movie's _____ plot failed to engage audiences looking for original storytelling.
The monastery's _____ living conditions reflected the monks' commitment to simplicity.
The politician tried to _____ the facts to avoid taking responsibility for the scandal.
The _____ passenger talked non-stop throughout the entire flight.

instructions.contextual: Choose the best word to complete each sentence.
instructions.definition: Provide a clear and accurate definition for each word (optional).
